original_text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers of my grace.
korean_text: 내가 너희 무리를 위하여 이와 같이 생각하는 것이 마땅하니 이는 너희가 내 마음에 있음이며 나의 매임과 복음을 변명함과 확정함에 너희가 다 나와 함께 은혜에 참여한 자가 됨이라

sentences.original_text: Even as it is meet for me
to think this of you all,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두에 대해 이렇게 생각하는 것이

sentences.original_text: because I have you in my heart;
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 내 마음에 두고 있기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: inasmuch as both in my bonds,
and in defence and confirmation of gospel,
ye all are partakers of my grace.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두가 내 은혜에 동참하는 자들이기 때문이라
